entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries and rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
